name: Bouncing Bounces
description:
You have to defeat the enemies in an infinite vertical platformer where youre a ball and you bounce everywhere. It's very simple, I just tried to make it fun, enjoy.

Controls:

A/ Left /Left Bumper for move the character

D/ Right / Right Bumper to attack
